item.description:
Friends, Please attend the
Nov 12th, 2011 - 2PM-6PM
ChickenPeace Educational Benefit
at the Peace Abbey
2 North Main Street
Sherborn, MA 01770

Included will be:

-A Brief History of the Peace Abbey's promotion of non-violence in our world , presented by Lewis Randa, Director of the Peace Abbey.
-A "ChickenPeace" Presentation by David Coman-Hidy,Boston Director of The Humane League 
-A free small savory meal from Belmont Veg, one of Worcester's best vegan restaurants
-A "Pay as you eat" dessert bar of tastey cupcakes and pastry squares, provided the       bakers of the former Country Life Restaurant
-A Tour of the Peace Abbey
-Announcements, and
-A Prayer for the Vitality of the Peace Abbey and for all that it stands.

Additional information may be obtained by emailing baerwolf@hotmail.com or by calling Steve at 508.842.1450

Thank you for caring!
item.name: ChickenPeace Educational Benefit for the Peace Abbey
